text: Additional Secretary in the Union Ministry of Culture K.K. Mittal inspected recently the facilities established in the Thanjavur Maharajah Serfoji’s Saraswati Mahal Library on Sunday along with Collector and Director-in-charge of the Library N. Subbaiyan. He saw the audio visual presentation on Thanjavur’s various aspects with a focus on the library and the palace complex that was produced for screening at the auditorium that has been constructed with funding from the Central Government. Later, he inspected the development works being undertaken at the complex.
title: Audio, visual presentation
